newsitem.title: UK: Unilever down after AGM statement.
newsitem.headline: Unilever down after AGM statement.

text.p: Unilever Plc shares fell in a surging UK market on Tuesday as its general meeting statement failed to provide fresh news on its planned speciality chemical sale, prompting some profit-taking, dealers and analysts said.

After touching a record 16.69 stg in early trade, some 25 percent above its level at the end of January, the stock was down 10p at 16.44-1/2 stg by 1342 GMT in volume of just under one million shares.
By contrast the blue chip FTSE 100 index was up 58.4 at 4,514.0, after earlier leaping to a record 4,525.6.
